title: Level 5 Extended Diploma in Accounting and Finance
shortDescription: Earn a UK accredited Level 4 and 5 Extended Diploma in Accounting and Finance with flexible online study and strong university progression routes.
overview: This UK accredited Extended Diploma in Accounting and Finance provides a strong foundation in financial and business practice, covering financial accounting, management accounting, economics, strategy, human resources, and business law. Learners can complete Level 4 (120 credits), Level 5 (120 credits), or a combined Level 4 & 5 pathway (240 credits). This qualification is equivalent to the first and second years of a UK undergraduate degree and is designed to support confident academic and career progression. On successful completion, learners can progress directly to the final year of a bachelor’s degree at a wide range of UK universities, either through on-campus study or flexible distance-learning routes. Progression opportunities may include Arden University, Coventry University, Edinburgh Napier University, the University of Bolton, the University of Central Lancashire (UCLan), the University of Cumbria, the University of Derby, the University of Hertfordshire, the University of Northampton, and the University of Sunderland, subject to individual university entry requirements.
whoItsFor: Aspiring accountants, finance professionals, career changers, business owners, and learners seeking a flexible pathway to a UK accounting or business degree.
whatYoullLearn: Financial and management accounting; budgeting and financial reporting; quantitative methods; business economics; leadership and team management; strategy and decision-making; human resource management; marketing for managers; business law; entrepreneurship and business start-up skills.
entryRequirements: Applicants must be aged 18 or over. Entry is open to learners with at least two A-levels (or equivalent qualifications). Applicants without formal qualifications are also welcome and may be considered based on relevant work experience or prior learning. If you are unsure about your eligibility, please use our enquiry form and our admissions team will be happy to advise.
duration: Flexible study up to 5 years to complete
delivery: Fully online with guided learning, assignments, webinars, and 1-2-1 tutor support.
priceNote: Pricing details are available on our tuition fees page. We offer flexible payment options to help spread the cost, and a free laptop is available for learners who pay the full course fee upfront (terms and conditions apply).

title: Level 5 Extended Diploma in Cyber Security
shortDescription: Develop advanced cyber security skills with a UK accredited 240-credit Level 5 Extended Diploma and progress to a UK university degree.
overview: This UK Level 5 Extended Diploma in Cyber Security is a 240-credit qualification designed to develop advanced technical and strategic cyber security capabilities. The programme covers threat and risk management, network and database security, digital investigations, cryptography, incident response, and cyber security leadership. It is structured across Level 4 and Level 5 content, providing a strong foundation followed by advanced specialist knowledge. Successful completion supports progression to a Level 6 university top-up degree in cyber security or related disciplines.
whoItsFor: Aspiring cyber security professionals, IT practitioners, career changers, and learners seeking progression into specialist security, forensics, or leadership roles.
whatYoullLearn: Cyber security threats and risk management; network and data communications security; database security and programming; incident response and digital forensics; security strategy, law and policy; cryptography; communications and incident management; strategic cyber security leadership.

Applicants without formal qualifications are also welcome and may be considered based on relevant work experience or prior learning. entryRequirements: Applicants must be aged 18 or over. Entry is open to learners with at least two A-levels (or equivalent qualifications). Applicants without formal qualifications are also welcome and may be considered based on relevant work experience or prior learning. If you are unsure about your eligibility, please use our enquiry form and our admissions team will be happy to advise.
duration: Flexible study up to 5 years to complete
delivery: Fully online with guided learning, assignments, webinars, and 1-2-1 tutor support.
priceNote: Pricing details are available on our tuition fees page. We offer flexible payment options to help spread the cost, and a free laptop is available for learners who pay the full course fee upfront (terms and conditions apply).
